Atkins is looking for a Senior Structural Engineer for Site Supervision team in Umluj, KSA for large Hospitality developments. Candidate who have good experience in Resort/Luxury Hotels/Palace/High rise Building.Minimum Requirements:Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering or equivalent.Minimum of 14 years of relevant experience Construction industry with comprehensive experience in Civil/Structural Engineering, associated technologies and facilities.Should have good experience in material submittals, method statement reviews.Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent technical, team-working and interpersonal skills.Experience and detailed knowledge of relevant international codes and standards. Candidates with previous experience on  projects will be given priority.Ability to make independent decisions in the planning, organizing and coordination of solutions to complex problems.Experience as a Lead Engineer for a team of discipline engineers..SNC Lavalin's Atkins business is one of the largest multidisciplinary, multi sector engineering design consultancies in the world and is part of the SNC Lavalin Group.As one of the world’s most respected design, engineering and project management consultancies with a leading track record in the defence sector, Atkins are ideally placed to respond to this market. We have a broad establishment and proud, 50 year history throughout the Middle East region.
We provide a full range of design, engineering and project management services for buildings, transportation and other infrastructure programmes.
Atkins in the Middle East now employs around 2,000 staff serving Gulf clients across all market sectors from offices in Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, Doha, Dubai, Jeddah, Kuwait City, Manama, Muscat, Riyadh, and Sharjah.Rewards & BenefitsWe offer an excellent package which includes:A competitive salary
